title: 'Absolutely
body: '5.0 out of 5 stars''I got this as a Sofa for our guest Bedroom / study room. On normal days this is a small Sofa and when Guest comes it can become a Bed.  As a Sofa - it is just comfortable enough not too comfortable that you will spend too much time on it but good enough to sit and have meeting and discussions  As a bed - this is not a replacement for a matress but an improvement from sleeping without any bed. For a temporary bed this is an Awesome product. But not recommended for continuous use.  Note:- for Bachelors / young couples on a budget get this Sofa add in a Mattress comforter that will do the Job..  Cheers. Good Job @Uberlyfe team'

title: 'As per my need'
body: Really liked the comfort it gives as I prefer somewhat hard bed to sleep on. Easy converting from bed to sofa in a few seconds. Liked the product. Giving 4 stars as I'm not sure about it's durability will see and get back with the update on this.
